short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A New-Tab Welcoming Screen. Perfect for night...

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Midnight Tab is a fresh screen that replaces the default New-Tab screen on chrome. This extension includes the date, time and some shortcuts to the most used websites.
